job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pio173 is partnered with a Management Consulting firm to scale up their Machine Learning Engineering team Our clients primary focus is on endtoend development of analytics solutions and their deployment at scale This role will play a key part in developing and deploying ML models in a production environmentppbrppWe are looking for experienced ML Engineers with professional experience interested in the Management Consulting IndustryppbrppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongpulliProductionize and deploy ML modelsliliWorking closely with data scientists and data engineers to produce and deploy machine learning modelsliliRefactoring code into reusable libraries and toolsliulpbrppstrongRequired QualificationsstrongpulliMasters Degree in CS or relevant arealili3 years professional experience in Machine Learning including Linear Regression Decision Trees Random Forest Deep Learning Experience must be outside of Academia and internships or candidates will not be consideredlili3 years in ML Engineer role deploying ML solutions in customer environmentsliliPython programing absolute must AdvancedliliStrong skills and experience in OODSW Engineering concepts including industry best practicesliliExperience with C C Java or Scala highly preferredliliExperience in ML Research is a bonus consistent experience in production environments is a MUSTliulpbrppstrongExpectationsstrongpulliMust be located in or willing to relocate to a location commutable to one of our clients major hubs Boston Chicago New York CityliliMust be willing to travel for work this will not be a fully remote roleliliWe will not consider C2C candidates for this role only directhire candidatesliliCandidates will go through multiple technical interviews including testing and coding rounds liulpbrppio173com acts as an employment agency for permanent recruitment By applying for this job you accept the Terms ampConditions Privacy Policy and Disclaimers which can be found at io173comp
